La Solución
                    The Solution
                
                
                    Plataforma de Seguridad Ofensiva IA-Nativa
                    AI-Native Offensive Security Platform
                
                
                    Tres pilares de protección contra amenazas específicas de IA
                    Three pillars of protection against AI-specific threats
                
            
            
            
                
                    🔍
                    
                        Descubrimiento Continuo
                        Continuous Discovery
                    
                    
                        Escaneo en tiempo real de todos los modelos IA, endpoints y pipelines de datos para vulnerabilidades
                        Real-time scanning of all AI models, endpoints, and data pipelines for vulnerabilities
                    
                
                
                    🧠
                    
                        Análisis Potenciado por IA
                        AI-Powered Analysis
                    
                    
                        Modelado avanzado de amenazas usando GPT-4, Claude y Gemini para evaluación integral
                        Advanced threat modeling using GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini for comprehensive assessment
                    
                
                
                    🛡️
                    
                        Protección Automatizada
                        Automated Protection
                    
                    
                        Guías de remediación instantánea y despliegue de controles protectores
                        Instant remediation playbooks and protective controls deployment

Industry-Leading AI Security Innovation
                
                    While others adapt traditional security for AI, we built AI-native security from the ground up.
                
                
                
                    
                        ✓
                        First platform with OWASP LLM Top 10 certification
                    
                    
                        ✓
                        Browser automation for dynamic vulnerability validation
                    
                    
                        ✓
                        Visual evidence generation with attack demonstrations
                    
                    
                        ✓
                        EU AI Act 2026 compliance-ready assessments
                    
                    
                        ✓
                        Multi-model security testing (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Llama)
                    
                
            
            
            
                Platform Performance Metrics
                
                    Detection Accuracy
                    94.7%

                    < 2%
